description: A series of short videos on key business topics you can use to "kick off" a meeting
descriptionMD: A series of short videos on key business topics you can use to "kick off" a meeting
name: Meeting Starters
subtitle: Meeting Starters

episodes.description: A very brief video that will help you decide if this series is a good investment of your time.
episodes.title: Introduction to Meeting Starters
episodes.transcript:
WEBVTT

1
00:00:00.610 --> 00:00:04.410
John Spence, trusted consultant,
respected advisor,

2
00:00:04.410 --> 00:00:08.270
experienced strategist,
passionate speaker, well-read author,

3
00:00:08.270 --> 00:00:13.290
a top 100 business though leader, helping
executives achieve most success everyday.

4
00:00:15.327 --> 00:00:16.885
>> I'd like take about two minutes and

5
00:00:16.885 --> 00:00:20.615
give you a quick overview of this
program to help you make a good decision

6
00:00:20.615 --> 00:00:23.685
about whether it would be the right
investment for your organization.

7
00:00:23.685 --> 00:00:26.415
These videos are based on
four programs I've taught for

8
00:00:26.415 --> 00:00:27.691
companies around the world.

9
00:00:27.691 --> 00:00:32.240
Advanced leadership,
high-performance teams, my formula for

10
00:00:32.240 --> 00:00:36.420
business excellence and
a big high-tier called moments of truth.

11
00:00:36.420 --> 00:00:40.860
Each of the videos is designed to be used
at a weekly, monthly, quarterly meeting

12
00:00:40.860 --> 00:00:45.510
to deliver some solid training, great
ideas, that your people can go back and

13
00:00:45.510 --> 00:00:49.600
implement right away to have a significant
positive impact on your business.

14
00:00:49.600 --> 00:00:53.230
These workshops are information intensive,
highly interactive, fast paced.

15
00:00:53.230 --> 00:00:56.540
It's gonna get your people engaged,
discussing things.

16
00:00:56.540 --> 00:01:01.060
Not just sit and watching a video, but
get them hands on, not only thinking about

17
00:01:01.060 --> 00:01:05.370
these great ideas, but figuring out how
they can apply them in your organization.

18
00:01:05.370 --> 00:01:07.487
I hope this helped you decide if
this would be a good investment for

19
00:01:07.487 --> 00:01:07.998
your company.

20
00:01:07.998 --> 00:01:17.998
[MUSIC]

episodes.description: A clear explanation of specifically how to help a work group or team become a high-performance team. Covers the role of the team, the purpose of the team and the six key elements of a high-performance team.
episodes.title: How to Build and Sustain a High Performance Team

episodes.description: Developed through direct work with leaders of top companies and a research study of 10,000 high potential employees, this session talks about the seven characteristics of a leader that people would willingly follow.
episodes.title: Key Characteristics of a Highly Effective Leader

episodes.description: Based on more than 20 years of research and work with hundreds of companies around the world, this video addresses four key elements that are the foundation of building a highly successful organization.
episodes.title: The Formula for Business Excellence

episodes.description: A very powerful idea that focuses on understanding that handful of essential interactions that must be delivered flawlessly in order to create highly engaged, loyal and satisfied customers.
episodes.title: Moments of Truth
